message.body: Hey I'm at work... what's up?
Sorry to bug u
We can talk another time just wanted to order a cake
We can catch up another time
Graduation cake
Do not worry about losing your mind to find the cake pan
Just draw the I love you symbols on plus a minon or two plus a gratuating cap on top.
Enough for 20 to 30 people
That is some details then honestly I need to ask u questions from there
I assume u do not work with fondant
I hate it
Yea I don't use fondant and ok I can work with that... I was just gonna carve the cake into that symbol or even attach "loaf" shaped cakes (as the fingers) to a regular cake
Order forms are mainly for simple orders.. anything complex like this I like to actually speak with the customer to brainstorm the design and all
Okay then we can talk later
That is probably best
I do not want u to lose your mind over this by having to carve it etc
I will be home at the latest after 6pm
I promise to post a photo of it .. Maybe it will get u some CCP business
Lol wouldn't be that bad its a simple shape but sure I can call... that works bec I get done work at 7
Lol awesome
Graduation is at temple, as I am sure u already know
Yea
So if that is easier for u to meet us for the pick up
Or another place that isn't as crowded on the way home
Since we do not live near each other and right after the graduation everyone is headed back to my house for a get together with direct family
Won't matter.. I pick up my brother from temple every Friday at 5:00, worst time. So I already have my favorite route. That's twenty mins besides Steph delivers and she gets paid to lmao
But yea where ever you wanna do it just let me know
She doesn't deliver to springfield does she
Kinda far
I am trying to make this easier on u
We just delivered to cherry hill on Sunday. So wouldn't be a problem
Wow!!
Yea.. its just a $5 feeto cover gas for Steph. $10 for Jersey since tolls so Springfield is do-able
We try to make it convenient for the buyer lol
5 dollars that it
K it's worth it . 218 alliston road springfield pa 19064
If u want directions let me know
If she can deliver it the Friday before on May 3rd that would be great
Ok cool... you'll be in class during my lunch break so ill call ya after work and well work out all the details
Not a problem. Would be after 5 tho bec That's when she gets off work on Fridays
Sounds grast and sorry again to bug u at work
Lol no trouble at all
Perfect
May 2nd I meAn
Lol yea I knew what you meant

Hey hope I don't wake you if you're sleeping but total price (including delivery) would be $58... only detail I'm missing is flavor of cake lol (chocolate, yellow, strawberry, red velvet, marble, etc)
Yellow
Ok
And icing Is just buttercream? Like not choc buttercream
I'm parked on the lil st... I doubt ill remember lol
Lol sorry meant to text that the Steph
No chic
Chocolate
I will can email u this if u think u will forget
The order? Nah I already have it written down.
K
I'm excited for your cake! Can't wait to do it
That is sweet to hear
I understand why I am excited. When I woke up this morning I told the kids about it right away. They had a huge smile about the minion graduation cap part
Person nelly I am dying to see what u do and being able to see up close and eat one of your creations!'

Hahaha good I'm glad they like the idea too.. caps on the minions was the first thought that came to mind when you mentioned them but I have another idea that I'm sure you'll think is cool. That's what I'm mostly excited about since you don't know it yet
Good now I am more excited because part of want unto just create something and surprise me
Just ch
